verses.verse: Then came <S%H935><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%> to Hebron, <S%H2275><s%> and spoke, <S%H559><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> we are your bone <S%H6106><s%> and your flesh. <S%H1320><s%>

Also <S%H1571><s%> in time <S%H865><s%> <S%H8543><s%> past, <S%H8032><s%> when Saul <S%H7586><s%> was king <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> us, you were <S%H1961><s%> he that led <S%H3318><s%> out and brought <S%H935><s%> in Israel: <S%H3478><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to you, You shall feed <S%H7462><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and you shall be a captain <S%H5057><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

So all <S%H3605><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> to Hebron; <S%H2275><s%> and king <S%H4428><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> a league <S%H1285><s%> with them in Hebron <S%H2275><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and they anointed <S%H4886><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
David <S%H1732><s%> was thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when he began to reign, <S%H4427><s%> and he reigned <S%H4427><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

In Hebron <S%H2275><s%> he reigned <S%H4427><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> months: <S%H2320><s%> and in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> he reigned <S%H4427><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> and Judah. <S%H3063><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> and his men <S%H582><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to the Jebusites, <S%H2983><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land: <S%H776><s%> which spoke <S%H559><s%> to David, <S%H1732><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Except <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> you take <S%H5493><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> the blind <S%H5787><s%> and the lame, <S%H6455><s%> you shall not come <S%H935><s%> in here: thinking, <S%H559><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> cannot <S%H3808><s%> come <S%H935><s%> in here.
Nevertheless David <S%H1732><s%> took <S%H3920><s%> the strong <S%H4686><s%> hold <S%H4686><s%> of Zion: <S%H6726><s%> the same <S%H1931><s%> is the city <S%H5892><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%> on that day, <S%H3117><s%> Whoever gets <S%H5060><s%> up to the gutter, <S%H6794><s%> and smites <S%H5221><s%> the Jebusites, <S%H2983><s%> and the lame <S%H6455><s%> and the blind <S%H5787><s%>that are hated <S%H8130><s%> of David's <S%H1732><s%> soul, <S%H5315><s%> he shall be chief and captain. Why <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> they said, <S%H559><s%> The blind <S%H5787><s%> and the lame <S%H6455><s%> shall not come <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the house. <S%H1004><s%>

So David <S%H1732><s%> dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in the fort, <S%H4686><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> it the city <S%H5892><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%> And David <S%H1732><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about from Millo <S%H4407><s%> and inward. <S%H1004><s%>
And David <S%H1732><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> on, and grew great, <S%H1419><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> was with him.

And Hiram <S%H2438><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Tyre <S%H6865><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> to David, <S%H1732><s%> and cedar <S%H730><s%> trees, <S%H6086><s%> and carpenters, <S%H2796><s%> <S%H6086><s%> and masons: <S%H2796><s%> <S%H68><s%> and they built <S%H1129><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> an house. <S%H1004><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> perceived <S%H3045><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had established <S%H3559><s%> him king <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and that he had exalted <S%H5375><s%> his kingdom <S%H4467><s%> for his people <S%H5971><s%> Israel's <S%H3478><s%> sake. <S%H5668><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> him more <S%H5750><s%> concubines <S%H6370><s%> and wives <S%H802><s%> out of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he was come <S%H935><s%> from Hebron: <S%H2275><s%> and there were yet <S%H5750><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters <S%H1323><s%> born <S%H3205><s%> to David. <S%H1732><s%>

And these <S%H428><s%> be the names <S%H8034><s%> of those that were born <S%H3209><s%> to him in Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%> Shammuah, <S%H8051><s%> and Shobab, <S%H7727><s%> and Nathan, <S%H5416><s%> and Solomon, <S%H8010><s%>
Ibhar <S%H2984><s%> also, and Elishua, <S%H474><s%> and Nepheg, <S%H5298><s%> and Japhia, <S%H3309><s%>
And Elishama, <S%H476><s%> and Eliada, <S%H450><s%> and Eliphalet. <S%H467><s%>

But when the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> that they had anointed <S%H4886><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> came <S%H5927><s%> up to seek <S%H1245><s%> David; <S%H1732><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> of it, and went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the hold. <S%H4686><s%>
The Philistines <S%H6430><s%> also came <S%H935><s%> and spread <S%H5203><s%> themselves in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Rephaim. <S%H7497><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> inquired <S%H7592><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Shall I go <S%H5927><s%> up to the Philistines? <S%H6430><s%> will you deliver <S%H5414><s%> them into my hand? <S%H3027><s%> And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to David, <S%H1732><s%> Go <S%H5927><s%> up: for I will doubtless deliver <S%H5414><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> into your hand. <S%H3027><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Baalperazim, <S%H1188><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> them there, <S%H8033><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> has broken <S%H6555><s%> forth on my enemies <S%H341><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me, as the breach <S%H6556><s%> of waters. <S%H4325><s%> Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> he called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of that place <S%H4725><s%> Baalperazim. <S%H1188><s%>
And there <S%H8033><s%> they left <S%H5800><s%> their images, <S%H6091><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> and his men <S%H582><s%> burned <S%H5375><s%> them.
And the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> came <S%H5927><s%> up yet <S%H5750><s%> again, <S%H3254><s%> and spread <S%H5203><s%> themselves in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Rephaim. <S%H7497><s%>

And when David <S%H1732><s%> inquired <S%H7592><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> You shall not go <S%H5927><s%> up; but fetch a compass <S%H5437><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> them, and come <S%H935><s%> on them over <S%H4136><s%> against <S%H4136><s%> the mulberry <S%H1057><s%> trees.

And let it be, when you hear <S%H8085><s%> the sound <S%H6963><s%> of a going <S%H6807><s%> in the tops <S%H7218><s%> of the mulberry <S%H1057><s%> trees, that then <S%H227><s%> you shall bestir <S%H2782><s%> yourself: for then <S%H227><s%> shall the LORD <S%H3068><s%> go <S%H3318><s%> out before <S%H6440><s%> you, to smite <S%H5221><s%> the host <S%H4264><s%> of the Philistines. <S%H6430><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so, <S%H3651><s%> as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> him; and smote <S%H5221><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> from Geba <S%H1387><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> you come <S%H935><s%> to Gazer. <S%H1507><s%>
